typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewid as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_eligibilitystatusid as string,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewtypeid as string,
		ntt_creditornotes as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_debtid as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_courtdecisionnotes as string,
		ntt_moneyadvisernotes as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId as string,
		strNTTDebtId as string,
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		owningbusinessunit,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewid,
		createdby,
		ntt_eligibilitystatusid,
		ntt_debteligibilityreviewtypeid,
		ntt_creditornotes,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		ntt_debtid,
		owninguser,
		modifiedby,
		createdon,
		ntt_courtdecisionnotes,
		ntt_moneyadvisernotes,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId,
		strNTTDebtId,
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId,
		blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/debteligibilityreview',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTDebtEligibilityReviewId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
